name: Oven-Roasted Chickpeas
author: bpuckett87
summary: This is a great, healthy snack or finger food that pairs well with a cold beer, if desired. I came up with this recipe and needed to share.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon salt, divided, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Combine drained chickpeas, olive oil, 2 teaspoons salt, hot sauce, paprika, garlic powder, chili powder, black pepper, and cumin in a large bowl
Bake in the center of the preheated oven, stirring every 10 to 15 minutes, until chickpeas are golden and look dry on the outside, about 45 minutes
Remove from oven and sprinkle with remaining 1 teaspoon salt
Let cool before serving, 5 to 10 minutes
